data.text:
After training on a day with the Selection Race 
looming. I called out to Tamamo Cross since I 
wanted to talk to her about something…
data.processed:
󠁿After training on a day with the Selection Race 
󠁿looming. I called out to Tamamo Cross since I 
󠁿wanted to talk to her about something…

data.text:
I'm done with my cooldown now. 
And… what did ya wanna talk about?
data.name: Tamamo Cross

choices.text: My last bit of advice for the Selection Race
choices.processed: <size=38>My last bit of advice for the Selection Race</size>

choices.text: My last bit of advice for the Selection Race
choices.processed: <size=38>My last bit of advice for the Selection Race</size>

data.processed:
󠁿I'm done with my cooldown now. 
󠁿And… what did ya wanna talk about?

data.text:
Last bit of… advice? Whadaya mean by that? 
Don't tell me, ya started ta think I can't win-
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Last bit of… advice? Whadaya mean by that? 
󠁿Don't tell me, ya started ta think I can't win-

data.text:
I shook my head, denying her words. It's the exact 
opposite. If it's Tamamo Cross, I believe she 
can win, so in that way, it's the last.

choices.text: On the day of the race, make sure to have fun
choices.processed: <size=36>On the day of the race, make sure to have fun</size>

data.processed:
󠁿I shook my head, denying her words. It's the exact 
󠁿opposite. If it's Tamamo Cross, I believe she 
󠁿can win, so in that way, it's the last.

data.text:
W-… what the heck are ya sayin'?! It's a serious competition! 
There's no way I've got th' leeway ta just have fun!!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿W-… what the heck are ya sayin'?! It's a serious competition! 
󠁿There's no way I've got th' leeway ta just have fun!!

data.text: Wha-
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿Wha-

data.text:
The reason that Tamamo Cross can't exert her full power, 
I explained to her my thoughts on why that might be…
data.processed:
󠁿The reason that Tamamo Cross can't exert her full power, 
󠁿I explained to her my thoughts on why that might be…

data.text:
Haaa… haaa… haaa…!! 
Gonna win…! For sure, gotta win…!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Haaa… haaa… haaa…!! 
󠁿Gonna win…! For sure, gotta win…!

data.text:
'Cuz they helped me get ta Tracen Academy, I can't go on losin'! 
It ain't good if I can't win! But even then-
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿'Cuz they helped me get ta Tracen Academy, I can't go on losin'! 
󠁿It ain't good if I can't win! But even then-

data.text:
Tamamo Cross' feelings, of wanting to win for the sake of her 
family are strong… maybe too strong.
data.processed:
󠁿Tamamo Cross' feelings, of wanting to win for the sake of her 
󠁿family are strong… maybe too strong.

data.text:
That's the main reason her motivation is so strong. Maybe that 
desire to grow stronger has narrowed her field of view.
data.processed:
󠁿That's the main reason her motivation is so strong. Maybe that 
󠁿desire to grow stronger has narrowed her field of view.

data.text:
But those feelings are an irreplaceable, precious thing. 
Therefore, I told her this. Embrace those feelings and-
data.processed:
󠁿But those feelings are an irreplaceable, precious thing. 
󠁿Therefore, I told her this. Embrace those feelings and-

data.text:
The feelings towards her family, and the joy of 
running. With both of those, Tamamo Cross will 
definitely win. That's the answer I came to.
data.processed:
󠁿The feelings towards her family, and the joy of 
󠁿running. With both of those, Tamamo Cross will 
󠁿definitely win. That's the answer I came to.

data.text:
…I did say that. Faster an' havin' more fun 
than anyone, White Lightning… but… havin' 
fun while runnin'… can I really win…?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿…I did say that. Faster an' havin' more fun 
󠁿than anyone, White Lightning… but… havin' 
󠁿fun while runnin'… can I really win…?

data.text:
…Hahaa. I've been a real blockhead, haven't I? 
I jus' now, fiiinally realized it after ya said that…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿…Hahaa. I've been a real blockhead, haven't I? 
󠁿I jus' now, fiiinally realized it after ya said that…

data.text:
The one holdin' me back… was me, this whole 
time. Thinkin' this wasn't a place ta be havin' 
fun, thinkin' only 'bout winnin'…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿The one holdin' me back… was me, this whole 
󠁿time. Thinkin' this wasn't a place ta be havin' 
󠁿fun, thinkin' only 'bout winnin'…

data.text:
But that ain't me. 
Th' real "White Lightning"-
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿But that ain't me. 
󠁿Th' real "White Lightning"-

data.text:
Uoooooooooooooo!! 
My runnin'! Howzzat?!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Uoooooooooooooo!! 
󠁿My runnin'! Howzzat?!

data.text: Neene, you're so cool~!
data.name: Tamamo's Younger Siblings
data.processed: 󠁿Neene, you're so cool~!

data.text:
Tama, yer really making it look like yer havin' fun! 
-Yo, "White Lightning"! Japan's best!
data.name: Tamamo's Younger Siblings
data.processed:
󠁿Tama, yer really making it look like yer havin' fun! 
󠁿-Yo, "White Lightning"! Japan's best!

data.text:
…That last bit 'a advice, I got it. Ya better be lookin' 
forward ta th' Selection Race. Me too… I'll be havin' a blast!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿…That last bit 'a advice, I got it. Ya better be lookin' 
󠁿forward ta th' Selection Race. Me too… I'll be havin' a blast!

data.text: And so, the day of the Selection Race arrived-
data.processed: 󠁿And so, the day of the Selection Race arrived-

data.text:
-We're approaching the final corner and there 
hasn't been a change to the situation! Will 
the girls in the back make it in time?!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿-We're approaching the final corner and there 
󠁿hasn't been a change to the situation! Will 
󠁿the girls in the back make it in time?!

data.text:
(-Th' sound 'a th' wind. Th' feel 'a th' ground. Th' beatin' 'a 
my heart. It's a familiar feelin', an' it's been a while)
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿(-Th' sound 'a th' wind. Th' feel 'a th' ground. Th' beatin' 'a 
󠁿my heart. It's a familiar feelin', an' it's been a while)

data.text:
(I spent all that time thinkin' 'bout nothin' but winnin'- 
I'd forgotten how good it feels ta just run…!)
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿(I spent all that time thinkin' 'bout nothin' but winnin'- 
󠁿I'd forgotten how good it feels ta just run…!)

data.text:
(This feelin' jus' won't stop! I still got plenty ta spare…! 
Jus' watch me…! From here on, I'll show ya what I can do!)
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿(This feelin' jus' won't stop! I still got plenty ta spare…! 
󠁿Jus' watch me…! From here on, I'll show ya what I can do!)

data.text: -Uooooooooooo!!!!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿-Uooooooooooo!!!!

data.text:
Tamamo Cross is catching up! Coming up from behind it's Tamamo 
Cross! In one big surge Tamamo Cross pulls ahead!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿Tamamo Cross is catching up! Coming up from behind it's Tamamo 
󠁿Cross! In one big surge Tamamo Cross pulls ahead!!

data.text:
Tamamo Cross is out in front! Tamamo Cross! After putting on such 
tremendous pressure, she magnificently grasps victory!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿Tamamo Cross is out in front! Tamamo Cross! After putting on such 
󠁿tremendous pressure, she magnificently grasps victory!!

data.text:
Hell ya!! This is th' real me!! 
The "White Lightning", Tamamo Cross!!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Hell ya!! This is th' real me!! 
󠁿The "White Lightning", Tamamo Cross!!

data.text:
…looks like she had much more to spare this time around. 
I seem to have misjudged her potential.
data.name: Average Trainer A
data.processed:
󠁿…looks like she had much more to spare this time around. 
󠁿I seem to have misjudged her potential.

data.text:
That powerful drive at the end… I thought she 
wouldn't have enough power in that small body, 
but she's not to be taken lightly…
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
󠁿That powerful drive at the end… I thought she 
󠁿wouldn't have enough power in that small body, 
󠁿but she's not to be taken lightly…

data.text:
-I did it, I did it I diiiiiid it! 
Did ya see tha' run?!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿-I did it, I did it I diiiiiid it! 
󠁿Did ya see tha' run?!

data.text:
Got tha' right! 'sall thanks ta you! 
Really… really, thank ya!
data.name: Tamamo Cross

choices.text: It's because you worked so hard
It's because you worked so hard

data.processed:
󠁿Got tha' right! 'sall thanks ta you! 
󠁿Really… really, thank ya!

data.text: Hehe-
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿Hehe-

data.text:
…well, ya see. Now tha' th' Selection Race 
is over, our provisional contract is done, so 
I guess tha' makes me a free agent…

…pu. Fufuu, hahahahaa! 
DAAAAA HAA HAA HAA!!

Once more… I'll be relyin' on ya again from now on. 
—Trainer!

I grasped the hand she held out and we shook firmly. 
The days spent with Tamamo Cross, start now-!
